00070     class SIM_API Node
00071     {
00072         friend class cTopology;
00073 
00074       private:
00075         int module_id;
00076         double wgt;
00077         bool enabl;
00078 
00079         int num_in_links;
00080         Link **in_links;
00081         int num_out_links;
00082         Link *out_links;
00083 
00084         // variables used by the shortest-path algorithms
00085         bool known;
00086         double dist;
00087         Link *out_path;
00088 
00089       public:
00092 
00096         int getModuleId() const  {return module_id;}
00097 
00101         cModule *getModule() const  {return simulation.getModule(module_id);}
00102 
00107         double getWeight() const  {return wgt;}
00108 
00113         void setWeight(double d)  {wgt=d;}
00114 
00119         bool isEnabled() const  {return enabl;}
00120 
00125         void enable()  {enabl=true;}
00126 
00131         void disable()  {enabl=false;}
00133 
00136 
00140         int getNumInLinks() const  {return num_in_links;}
00141

00146

00151 
00155         LinkOut *getLinkOut(int i);
00157 
00160

00165 
00170         int getNumPaths() const  {return out_path?1:0;}

00188

00238     class SIM_API LinkIn : public Link
00239     {
00240       public:
00248         Node *getRemoteNode() const  {return src_node;}
00249 
00253         int getRemoteGateId() const  {return src_gate;}
00254 
00258         int getLocalGateId() const  {return dest_gate;}
00259 
00263         cGate *getRemoteGate() const  {return src_node->getModule()->gate(src_gate);}
00264 
00268         cGate *getLocalGate() const  {return dest_node->getModule()->gate(dest_gate);}
00269     };

00280     class SIM_API LinkOut : public Link
00281     {
00282       public:
00290         Node *getRemoteNode() const  {return dest_node;}
00291 
00295         int getRemoteGateId() const  {return dest_gate;}
00296 
00300         int getLocalGateId() const  {return src_gate;}
00301 
00305         cGate *getRemoteGate() const  {return dest_node->getModule()->gate(dest_gate);}
00306 
00310         cGate *getLocalGate() const  {return src_node->getModule()->gate(src_gate);}
00311     };
